text: Rafael Palmero Ramos (27 July 1936 â€• 8 March 2021) was a Spanish Roman Catholic prelate. He was the auxiliary bishop of Toledo between 1987 and 1996. He was the bishop of Palencia between 1996 and 2006 and of Orihuela-Alicante between 2006 and 2012. Palmero Ramos, who had lung cancer, was infected with COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain in January 2021. He died on 8 March 2021 from problems caused by the diseases, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Spanish Roman Catholic bishops Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Spain Category:Deaths from lung cancer
title: Rafael Palmero Ramos
